name: REQUISITION_DELETED_SCAN
description: This table contains information about a requisition's deleted lab scans.

columns.name: REQUISITION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the requisition record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REQ_DELETED_SCAN_DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the document that was deleted from the requision.
